page.title: 16Leisure (Part 2)
page.content: Saunton Sands is just off our 12km block but it is one of the largest stretches of firm, hard sand in Great Britain. Recently, the 3rd annual sand yachting world champions were held. The races came into our study area near{Airy Point. }The Sand Yachts used were just like Windsurfing boards but were mounted on wheels. Competitors from all over Europe took part. The "yachts" can travel up to eighty miles per hour if conditions are right. The sportsman wear protective helmets and knee, elbow and shoulder pads in case they fall off the yachts. Unlike the old fashioned Sand Yachts which had a seat and steering mechanism, these boards / yachts are manouvred by shifting body weight and moving the sail. As this type of sport is performed standing up it could be quite dangerous.
